amendment.description: To provide $10 million in election related assistance to Haiti through the OAS.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3693 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3693 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S9588-9592; text: CR S9589) To provide $10 million in election related assistance to Haiti through the OAS.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3693 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3693 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Dodd.
